mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CRT_NO, CRT_M_NO, CRT_P_NO, CRT_AMOUNT) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CART WHERE CRT_M_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY CRT_NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE CRT_P_NO = #{param1} AND CRT_M_NO = #{param2}
